short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Revolutionize browsing with QuickGPT! Get ChatGPT responses directly on any website.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
QuickGPT: Your AI-powered content generator!

How it works:

1. Press CTRL+ALT and click any text block on a website.
2. Choose from preinstalled or custom prompts to get ChatGPT responses instantly.


Examples of what you can do:

- Fact-check or detect propaganda.
- Compose responses to posts.
- Generate catchy headlines or tweets.
- Create stories, speeches, limericks, and more!


Elevate your browsing experience with personalized AI-generated content in just a few clicks!
